description:
Stay comfy and stay seen. With its large reflective panel and ergonomic riding position, the Vivo Ergo has been designed with urban riding and commuting in mind. Specially design wings help remove pressure from your sit bones, so longer rides feel better.

  • Multi-density foam panels are supportive and comfortable
  • Perineal dip relieves pressure where it is needed most
  • Supportive wings are easy on your sit bones
  • Textured cover reduces slippage
  • Promotes an athletic, yet ergonomic riding position
name: Selle Royal Vivo Ergo Athletic Saddle - Unisex
